name: Project StarBem
description:
Hi, my nickname is The Developer Duckie.

And about two years ago I started a project called project alpharis 301 that consisted of an 8-bit shoot em' up video game.

Unfortunately for lack of time I had to cancel the project.

The thing is that the following year while studying, I remembered the project, and I regretted leaving it.

So, I decided to rescue some sprites and material from the canceled project to create an earthbound hack rom, and that was it, today the project is still in development and I think it would not be bad to do an itch.io to make it known.
